constructor.details: This contract needs to receive an ERC20 `_rewardToken` in order to distribute them (with MoneyMaker in our case)

params._mim: The address of the MIM token
params._spell: The address of the SPELL token

params._amount: The amount of SPELL to deposit

params.direct: True if `newOwner` should be set immediately. False if `newOwner` needs to use `claimOwnership`.
params.renounce: Allows the `newOwner` to be `address(0)` if `direct` and `renounce` is True. Has no effect otherwise.

updateReward().details: Needs to be called before any deposit or withdrawal

params._amount: The amount of SPELL to withdraw

userInfo.details: Info of each user that stakes SPELL

ClaimReward(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user claims reward

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user deposits SPELL

EmergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user emergency withdraws its SPELL

Withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user withdraws SPELL

accRewardPerShare().notice: Accumulated `token` rewards per share, scaled to `ACC_REWARD_PER_SHARE_PRECISION`

claimOwnership().notice: Needs to be called by `pendingOwner` to claim ownership.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit SPELL for reward token allocation

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY

mim().notice: Array of tokens that users can claim

pendingReward(address).notice: View function to see pending reward token on frontend

toggleLockUp(bool).notice: Allows to enable and disable the lockup

transferOwnership(address,bool,bool).notice: Transfers ownership to `newOwner`. Either directly or claimable by the new pending owner. Can only be invoked by the current `owner`.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw SPELL and harvest the rewards
